preqs: Twelve credit points of first-year Arts units.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ACL1%, AEH1%, AMU1%, ASA1%, ATS1%, AZA1%}

unitName: The art of teaching music performance
description: This unit introduces students to the art of teaching music performance, examining Australian curricula and the role of the music teacher in the advocacy of music education. Focusing on classroom and instrumental teaching, the unit examines and analyses various approaches to teaching instrumental music, both traditionally and creatively focused. In addition, the unit examines music education in select overseas countries to provide a comparison to the Australian context.
